message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I think it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $95. This is an excellent chance to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable discount. I trust you'll find it worthwhile. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.
